content: a 6 tail sew to cup between rnds 5-6 and 11-12 teapot with seamoss rnds 1-5 repeat rnds 1-5 of saucer 40 single_crochet round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in back loop only of each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet rnds7-9 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 10 chain 1 7 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 45 single_crochet rnds 11-13 repeat round 7 round 14 chain 1 7 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 40 single_crochet round 15 repeat round 7 round 16 chain 1 6 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 35 single_crochet round 17 repeat round 7 round 18 chain 1 5 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 30 single_crochet round 19 chain 1 turn slip_stitch in front loop only in ea st around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st st finish off round 20 w/ zarya fog and right side facing join w/ single_crochet in any free loop from round 19 single_crochet in ea free loop around join w/ sl st to 1st single_crochet finish off spout with seamoss round 1 chain 9 join w/ slip_stitch to 1st chain being careful not to twist chain single_crochet in same st as joining and ea chain around join w/ slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 9 single_crochet rnds 2-4 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st st round 5 chain 1 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st st 12 single_crochet round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st st round 7 chain 1 6 single_crochet slip_stitch in remaining single_crochet join w/ slip_stitch to1st single_crochet finish off leaving a 10 tail sew to center of teapot with the last 6 single_crochet made as the bottom of the spout handle with seamoss row 1 leaving a 6 tail chain 15 working in back loops only single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and ea chain across 14 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in ea single_crochet across finish off leaving 6 tail sew to teapot between rnds 6-7 and 17-18 teapot lid with seamoss rnds 1-4 repeat rnds 1-4 of saucer 32 single_crochet finish off lid knob with zarya fog chain 2 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook remove hook from that loop insert hook into the 1st single_crochet made then pick up the dropped loop from the 4th single_crochet and pull through finish off leaving 6 tail sew to center of lid sugar bowl with zarya fog copyright © 2005 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no part of this
